attributes.title: The creator should be ashamed
attributes.review: This app doesn’t even deserve zero stars it deserves -5,000,000 stars unuseful uneducated racist don’t even download this stupid app unfortunately I had very high hopes for this app but reins out I was extremely wrong!!

attributes.title: gave me a virus??!
attributes.review: i’m a republican so OBVIOUSLY i got this app so that i could keep up with all the AMAZING and NOT racist/homophobic/misogynistic things our AMAZING president is doing, but whenever i open the app a deformed orange appears on my screen??? donald trump hacked me AND gave me a virus???! i’m converting to liberal.

attributes.title: AWFUL DONT DOWNLAD
attributes.review: 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣 ya hee hee. The app is slow, ugly, spams your texts, my mental health is awful now, very unhealthy for the brain, I don’t know what the app is talking about half of the time, I’m getting spam emails, thy asked me for my credit card number 😡

attributes.title: data mine
attributes.review: To do anything in the app you HAVE to give them your information and now I get incessant messages from them asking me for money!! Don’t do it girl it’s not worth it

attributes.title: It’s terrible, the app
attributes.review: Had to enter a bunch of information right away. Needed phone number just to market me with calls and texts. Lots of fake news on the app.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I hated this app so much, it is a terrible system and although I love Trump and the way he sexually abuses young women and children, he created a terrible app. It’s disappointing because I love Trump so much and how he’s unfit, racist, xenophobic, transphobic, homophobic, uneducated, and a sexual predator.

attributes.title: I would give zero stars if possible.
attributes.review: This app is extremely offensive, as it shows pictures of a man who lusts over and has sex with children.... If you support him, you are supporting a child rapist.

attributes.title: i’m am so angry at trumpy!😡😡
attributes.review: My name is karen elizabeth smith and i recently downloaded this app. I love my cheeto, abusive, rapist, homophobic, and all around evil president! I got the app and it took my credit card information and my social security number😭😭😭 I’m so mad at trumpy 😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: The libtards have hacked the app
attributes.review: All though I love the president and he’s wonderful.
